data.text:
To kick off the 2024 New Year, the IBM & VMware by Broadcom partnership continues to strengthen with the recent announcement of VMware Cloud Foundation as a Cloud Service available on the IBM Public Cloud Marketplace.

IBM is the first VMware by Broadcom partner to have a managed VCF offering as a Cloud Service Provider.

VCF on IBM Cloud benefits include:

Automated build and deployment of the full VCF standardized stack as a production instance in under 20 minutes.

Pre-configured VCF Software integrated on purpose built compute, network, storage, management automation and security in a single tenant platform.

Available on the self-service IBM Cloud marketplace as a click-2-deploy tile found HERE.

License Portability: Bring-Your-Own-Subscription License to IBM Cloud is enabled.

VCF on IBM addresses key client pain around:

Workload & Migration complexity

Resource Expertise & Staff

License Flexibility

Managing Security

Compliance & Audit

Visibility & Control

Why IBM for VMware?

Time to Market & TCO Savings: Benefit from IBM Cloud’s automated build, deploy, & manage of a fully integrated VCF solution -vs- installing & managing an on-premise environment with in-house skills or hired labor resources.

Consolidate Infrastructure: Bring existing VMware workloads to the cloud without the need for significant modifications or changes to the existing VMware environment.

Enhance Flexibility: Scale resources up or down based on demand and leverage IBM Cloud’s global data center footprint for geographic diversity.

Simplify Operations: Manage both on-premises and cloud environments using familiar VMware tools and interfaces, streamlining operations and reducing complexity.
